verses.verse: By <WH5921> the rivers <WH5104> of Babylon, <WH894> there <WH8033> we sat down, <WH3427> yea, <WH1571> we wept, <WH1058> when we remembered <WH2142> <WH853> Zion. <WH6726>
We hanged <WH8518> our harps <WH3658> upon <WH5921> the willows <WH6155> in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

For <WH3588> there <WH8033> they that carried us away captive <WH7617> required <WH7592> of us a song; <WH1697> <WH7892> and they that wasted <WH8437> us required of us mirth, <WH8057> saying, Sing <WH7891> us one of the songs <WH4480> <WH7892> of Zion. <WH6726>
How <WH349> shall we sing <WH7891> <WH853> the LORD's <WH3068> song <WH7892> in <WH5921> a strange <WH5236> land? <WH127>
If <WH518> I forget <WH7911> thee, O Jerusalem, <WH3389> let my right hand <WH3225> forget <WH7911> her cunning.

If <WH518> I do not <WH3808> remember <WH2142> thee, let my tongue <WH3956> cleave <WH1692> to the roof of my mouth; <WH2441> if <WH518> I prefer <WH5927> not <WH3808> <WH853> Jerusalem <WH3389> above <WH5921> my chief <WH7218> joy. <WH8057>

Remember, <WH2142> O LORD, <WH3068> the children <WH1121> of Edom <WH123> <WH853> in the day <WH3117> of Jerusalem; <WH3389> who said, <WH559> Raze <WH6168> it, raze <WH6168> it, even to <WH5704> the foundation <WH3247> thereof.
O daughter <WH1323> of Babylon, <WH894> who art to be destroyed; <WH7703> happy <WH835> shall he be, that rewardeth <WH7945> <WH7999> thee as <WH854> <WH1576> thou hast served <WH7945> <WH1580> us.
Happy <WH835> shall he be, that taketh <WH7945> <WH270> and dasheth <WH5310> <WH853> thy little ones <WH5768> against <WH413> the stones. <WH5553>
